wikipedia_page.main: Jason Martin (born 14 September 1970) is an Australian former professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1990s. Primarily a halfback, he played for the North Sydney Bears, Newcastle Knights and the North Queensland Cowboys before moving to Paris Saint-Germain in the Super League.

response: *  1970   – Jason Martin, Australian rugby league player, singer, and guitarist

* Jason Martin (musician), member of the indie rock band Starflyer 59
* Jason Martin (rugby league) (born 1970), Australian former rugby league footballer
